attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-1073

Date: 2010-08-10

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Andr√© Bachand, Ambassador and Permanent Delegate of Canada to the United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO), as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($126,900 - $149,300), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Patrick Binns, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to Ireland, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($126,900 - $149,300), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Gary Doer, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($235,000 - $276,500), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jonathan T. Fried, Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to Japan, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($182,400 - $214,700), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Neil LeBlanc, Consul General of Canada at Boston, United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($141,200 - $166,100), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Jean-Carol Pelletier, High Commissioner for Canada to the Republic of Cameroon, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($113,300 - $133,400), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Daniel Sullivan, Consul General of Canada at New York, United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($163,100 - $191,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Loyola Sullivan, Ambassador for Fisheries Conservation, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($145,600 - $171,300), effective April 1, 2010.

 

   Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of David Mulroney, Senior Advisor to the Privy Council Office, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($209,800 - $246,900), effective April 1, 2010.

 

    Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Michael Wilson, former Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the United States of America, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($231,500 - $272,400), effective October 17, 2009.

 

    Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Robert G. Wright, former Ambassador Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of Canada to the People's Republic of China, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($206,700 - $243,200), effective September 10, 2009.
